CutSceneText.Text: An Artefact is a mysterious relic from the Tower of Eternity.
No two are alike, but they're all immensely powerful.
We don't understand the full extent of what an Artefact does,
but we can tap a fraction of its power
if we have the proper Activation Stone.
Each Artefact is a devastating weapon in the right hands:
Some can slaughter every enemy within sight,
and others can bring troops back from the brink of death.
Artefacts can turn defeat to victory--or vice versa--
A powerful Protector stands watch over every Artefact;
subdue the Protector, and the Artefact is yours.
